item.title: 2nd Script Auto Nudger
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I just downloaded the beta, and there are tons of / functions and commands.

I can now see nudges too, and you’re right, there still isn’t a nudge button, but there is a nudge command like mindtempest said.

/nudge and enter is all you need to send a nudge.

item.title: 2nd Script Auto Nudger
item.dc:creator: @mindtempest mindtempest
item.description:
@mindtempest wrote:

just dont use the official client, it has adware and eats ram. use gaim it has unlimited nudging and so you can just make a
repeat
sendKeys(’/nudge’+chr(13));
until(false)
and the other guy will be pummelled with nudges

item.title: 2nd Script Auto Nudger
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Just made one too. I was bored xD
[size=0pt]program MyNUDGER;

var
x, y, HowManyTimesToNudge, Nudges: Integer;
HowManyTimes: String;

begin
HowManyTimes:= ReadLn(‘How many times do you want to nudge the person?’);
HowManyTimesToNudge:= StrToInt(HowManyTimes);
ActivateClient;
if(findcolorspiral(x, y, 10448211, 85, 285, 121, 299))then
repeat
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
Nudges:= Nudges+1;
wait(11036);
until(howmanytimestonudge=nudges)
end.[/size]

Yea good scirpt there. Mine clicks the exact milisecond you can click again though. Ron let me test it out on his window

EDIT: Ok didn’t mean to really steal the topic. The point was that the wait is [scar]wait(11036);[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: 2nd Script Auto Nudger
item.dc:creator: @jrcdude jrcdude
item.description:
@jrcdude wrote:

Hi I made this script for MSN to auto nudge ppl Enjoy, and tell me what you think about it.

[scar]

program Auto_MSN_Nudger;
var
x, y: Integer;
begin
repeat
x:= 70;
y:= 70;
if(FindColorSpiral(x, y, 14139311, 0, 0, 1024, 768))then
begin
MoveMouse(x, y);
wait(100);
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
wait(100)
movemouse(240, 342)
wait(11000)
end else
begin
Writeln(‘COLOR NOT FOUND TRY AGAIN’);
end;
until false
end.

[/scar]

Read full topic
